data.title: Neethane Enn Ponvasantham Audio acquired by Sony Music!
data.meta_description: Neethane Enn Ponvasantham (NEP), directed by Gautham Menon and produced by RS Infotainment is one of the most highly anticipated movies, currently. NEP has Jiiva and Samantha playing the lead roles in it. The music for this movie has been scored by the ma
data.text: Neethane Enn Ponvasantham (NEP), directed by Gautham Menon and produced by RS Infotainment is one of the most highly anticipated movies, currently. NEP has Jiiva and Samantha playing the lead roles in it. The music for this movie has been scored by the maestro Ilaiyaraja, and this is the first time he is working on a Gautham Menon movie. The audio rights of this movie has been grabbed by Sony Music, at a whopping price. The audio rights of Gautham Menon's last movie, Vinnaithaandi Varuvaaya (VTV), composed by A.R. Rahman, was also acquired by Sony Music, and it went on to become a super-duper hit. A little birdie reveals that the rights of NEP were sold at a price much higher than that of VTV.
